azurerm_spring_cloud_service.description: Manages an Azure Spring Cloud Service.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Spring Cloud Service resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies The name of the resource group in which to create the Spring Cloud Service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

uri.description: The URI of the Git repository that's used as the Config Server back end should be started with `http://`, `https://`, `git@`, or `ssh://`.

label.description: The default label of the Git repository, should be the branch name, tag name, or commit-id of the repository.

search_paths.description: An array of strings used to search subdirectories of the Git repository.

repository.description: One or more `repository` blocks as defined below.

pattern.description: An array of strings used to match an application name. For each pattern, use the `{application}/{profile}` format with wildcards.

username.description: The username that's used to access the Git repository server, required when the Git repository server supports Http Basic Authentication.

password.description: The password used to access the Git repository server, required when the Git repository server supports Http Basic Authentication.

private_key.description: The SSH private key to access the Git repository, required when the URI starts with `git@` or `ssh://`.

host_key.description: The host key of the Git repository server, should not include the algorithm prefix as covered by `host-key-algorithm`.

host_key_algorithm.description: The host key algorithm, should be `ssh-dss`, `ssh-rsa`, `ecdsa-sha2-nistp256`, `ecdsa-sha2-nistp384`, or `ecdsa-sha2-nistp521`. Required only if `host-key` exists.

strict_host_key_checking_enabled.description: Indicates whether the Config Server instance will fail to start if the host_key does not match.

id.description: The ID of the Spring Cloud Service.

create.description: Used when creating the Spring Cloud Service.

update.description: Used when updating the Spring Cloud Service.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Spring Cloud Service.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Spring Cloud Service.
